title: Revolve Group net sales grow as AI’s role expands for shoppers
description:
Fashion retailer Revolve Group Inc. saw its earnings rise in its fiscal Q4, as net sales increased by 10.4% year over year to $324.37 million and the company detailed its latest investments in artificial intelligence (AI). Those technology priorities have included recommendations, marketing and styling advice, as well as customer service. In the meantime, beauty […]
The post Revolve Group net sales grow as AI’s role expands for shoppers appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
summary_ko: 패션 리테일러 Revolve Group이 4분기 매출 10.4% 증가한 3억 2,437만 달러를 기록했습니다. 회사는 추천 시스템, 마케팅, 스타일링 조언, 고객 서비스 등 AI 기술 투자를 확대하고 있습니다. AI 기술 도입으로 고객 경험 개선과 매출 성장을 동시에 달성하고 있는 상황입니다.
summary_en: Fashion retailer Revolve Group reported Q4 net sales growth of 10.4% year-over-year to $324.37 million. The company has been investing in AI technologies including recommendations, marketing, styling advice, and customer service. AI implementation is contributing to both improved customer experience and revenue growth.
so_what_ko: AI 기반 개인화 추천과 스타일링 서비스가 패션 D2C의 핵심 차별화 요소로 부상하고 있어, 고객 경험 향상을 통한 매출 증대 전략이 필요합니다.
so_what_en: AI-powered personalization and styling services are becoming key differentiators in fashion D2C, requiring investment in customer experience enhancement strategies for revenue growth.
key_points: Revolve Group achieved 10.4% YoY net sales growth to $324.37M in Q4
AI investments span recommendations, marketing, styling advice, and customer service
Technology integration driving both customer experience and financial performance

title: Defense secretary Pete Hegseth designates Anthropic a supply chain risk
description:
US President Donald Trump (R) looks on as US Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth speaks to the press following US military actions in Venezuela | AFP via Getty Images	

Nearly two hours after President Donald Trump announced on Truth Social that he was banning Anthropic products from the federal government, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth took it one step further and announced that he was now designating the AI company as a "supply-chain risk," which Anthropic says it is willing to challenge in court.
The decision could immediately impact numerous major tech companies that use Claude in their line of work for the Pentagon, including Palantir and AWS. It is not immediately clear to what extent the Pentagon may blacklist companies that contract with Claude for other services outside of national security, A …
Read the full story at The Verge.
summary_ko: 미국 국방부 장관 Pete Hegseth가 AI 회사 Anthropic을 공급망 리스크로 지정했습니다. 이 결정은 Pentagon과 협력하는 Palantir, AWS 등 주요 기술 회사들에 즉각적인 영향을 미칠 수 있습니다. Anthropic은 이 결정에 대해 법정에서 이의를 제기할 의사를 밝혔습니다.
summary_en: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth designated AI company Anthropic as a supply chain risk. This decision could immediately impact major tech companies like Palantir and AWS that use Claude for Pentagon work. Anthropic has indicated it is willing to challenge this designation in court.
so_what_ko: AI 서비스 제공업체의 정부 규제 리스크가 증가하고 있어, D2C 기업들은 AI 파트너 선택 시 컴플라이언스와 공급망 안정성을 고려해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Growing regulatory risks for AI service providers require D2C companies to consider compliance and supply chain stability when selecting AI partners.
key_points: Pentagon designated Anthropic as supply chain risk following Trump's federal ban
Major contractors like Palantir and AWS potentially affected
Anthropic plans to legally challenge the designation

title: [AINews] OpenAI closes $110B raise from Amazon, NVIDIA, SoftBank in largest startup fundraise in history @ $840B post-money
description: Congratulations, you secured the biggest number.
summary_ko: OpenAI가 Amazon, NVIDIA, SoftBank로부터 1,100억 달러 투자를 유치했습니다. 이는 스타트업 역사상 최대 규模의 투자 라운드입니다. 투자 후 기업가치는 8,400억 달러로 평가됩니다.
summary_en: OpenAI closed a $110 billion funding round from Amazon, NVIDIA, and SoftBank. This represents the largest startup fundraise in history. The post-money valuation reaches $840 billion.
so_what_ko: OpenAI의 대규모 투자 유치는 AI 기술 경쟁 심화와 상용화 가속을 의미하며, D2C 기업들의 AI 도입 비용 절감과 기능 향상 기회를 제공할 것입니다.
so_what_en: OpenAI's massive funding indicates intensifying AI competition and faster commercialization, providing D2C companies with opportunities for cost-effective AI adoption and enhanced capabilities.
key_points: OpenAI raised $110B from Amazon, NVIDIA, SoftBank
Largest startup fundraise in history
Post-money valuation of $840 billion

title: Dylan Patel of SemiAnalysis on the $200B AI CapEx, Chip Wars, and Why Google Might Have No Profits in 2027 — In-Context Cooking
description: We’re excited to announce our new show In-Context Cooking where guests cook while chatting about cool topics.
summary_ko: SemiAnalysis의 Dylan Patel이 2,000억 달러 AI 자본 지출과 칩 전쟁에 대해 논의했습니다. Google이 2027년 무수익 가능성에 대한 분석도 포함되었습니다. 새로운 쇼 'In-Context Cooking'에서 요리하며 대화하는 형식으로 진행되었습니다.
summary_en: Dylan Patel from SemiAnalysis discussed $200B AI CapEx and chip wars. The analysis included potential for Google having no profits in 2027. The discussion took place on the new show 'In-Context Cooking' where guests cook while chatting.
so_what_ko: AI 인프라 투자 급증과 빅테크 수익성 압박은 AI 서비스 가격 변동성을 야기할 수 있어, D2C 기업들은 AI 비용 관리 전략을 수립해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Massive AI infrastructure investment and big tech profitability pressure may cause AI service price volatility, requiring D2C companies to develop cost management strategies.
key_points: $200B AI capital expenditure discussed
Analysis of chip wars and industry dynamics
Potential Google profitability concerns for 2027

title: Ultrahuman Ring Pro Brings Better Battery Life, More Action and Analysis
description: The company's new flagship smart ring stores more data, too. But that doesn't really help Americans.
summary_ko: 울트라휴먼이 새로운 플래그십 스마트링 Ring Pro를 출시했습니다. 향상된 배터리 수명과 더 많은 데이터 저장 용량을 제공합니다. 하지만 미국 소비자에게는 큰 도움이 되지 않는다고 평가됩니다.
summary_en: Ultrahuman launched its new flagship smart ring, the Ring Pro, featuring improved battery life and increased data storage capacity. The device offers enhanced action tracking and analysis capabilities. However, the improvements may not significantly benefit American consumers.
so_what_ko: 웨어러블 헬스케어 시장에서 배터리 수명과 데이터 용량이 주요 차별화 요소로 부상하고 있어 D2C 브랜드들은 이러한 기술적 개선사항을 제품 마케팅에 적극 활용해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Battery life and data capacity are emerging as key differentiators in wearable healthcare, requiring D2C brands to leverage these technical improvements in their product marketing strategies.
key_points: Enhanced battery life in smart ring technology
Increased data storage capacity for health tracking
Limited impact for American market consumers

title: MWC 2026 Updates: All the News, Reveals and Concepts Debuting in Barcelona
description: The world's most important mobile show kicks off on Monday and will show off wild phone concepts along with new devices launching later this year.
summary_ko: 2026년 모바일 월드 콩그레스(MWC)가 바르셀로나에서 월요일에 시작됩니다. 세계에서 가장 중요한 모바일 쇼로 평가받는 이 행사에서 다양한 혁신적인 스마트폰 컨셉과 새로운 기기들이 공개될 예정입니다. 올해 후반 출시될 신제품들의 발표도 기대됩니다.
summary_en: Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2026 kicks off Monday in Barcelona as the world's most important mobile show. The event will showcase innovative phone concepts and reveal new devices set to launch later this year. Various product announcements and technological concepts are expected to debut at the conference.
so_what_ko: MWC는 모바일 기술 트렌드의 방향성을 제시하는 핵심 이벤트로, D2C 브랜드들은 이곳에서 공개되는 혁신 기술들을 주목하여 향후 제품 전략에 반영해야 합니다.
so_what_en: MWC serves as a key indicator of mobile technology trends, making it essential for D2C brands to monitor innovations revealed here for future product strategy integration.
key_points: World's most important mobile technology showcase
Debut of innovative phone concepts and new devices
Preview of products launching later in 2026

title: How a Pro Writer Uses AI
description:
To freelance writer and editor Kaleigh Moore, AI greatly increases efficiency, with limits.
The post How a Pro Writer Uses AI appeared first on Practical Ecommerce.
summary_ko: 프리랜서 작가이자 편집자인 칼리 무어(Kaleigh Moore)는 AI가 작업 효율성을 크게 향상시킨다고 평가합니다. 하지만 AI 활용에는 분명한 한계가 있다고 지적합니다. 전문 작가의 관점에서 AI 도구의 실질적 활용법과 제약사항을 분석했습니다.
summary_en: Freelance writer and editor Kaleigh Moore reports that AI significantly increases work efficiency in professional writing. However, she acknowledges clear limitations in AI applications for content creation. The analysis provides insights into practical AI tool usage and constraints from a professional writer's perspective.
so_what_ko: AI 콘텐츠 생성 도구의 효율성과 한계를 이해하고, D2C 브랜드들은 AI를 보조 도구로 활용하되 인간의 창작 역량과 균형있게 결합하는 콘텐츠 전략을 수립해야 합니다.
so_what_en: Understanding AI content generation efficiency and limitations, D2C brands should develop content strategies that use AI as a supplementary tool while balancing human creative capabilities.
key_points: AI significantly improves writing efficiency
Clear limitations exist in AI content creation
Professional perspective on practical AI usage

title: Retail brands want their tariff money back
description: Allbirds, On and more have filed lawsuits after the latest turn in the tariff landscape, though the industry is slowly becoming “desensitized” to trade volatility.
summary_ko: 올버즈(Allbirds), 온(On) 등 리테일 브랜드들이 관세 환급을 요구하며 소송을 제기했습니다. 트럼프 행정부의 국제비상경제권법(IEEPA) 관련 관세 정책 변화가 배경입니다. 업계는 무역 변동성에 점차 둔감해지고 있다고 평가됩니다.
summary_en: Retail brands including Allbirds and On have filed lawsuits seeking tariff refunds following recent changes in tariff policy. The legal actions stem from the latest developments in the Trump administration's International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) related policies. The industry is reportedly becoming increasingly desensitized to trade volatility.
so_what_ko: 관세 정책 변화에 대응하여 D2C 브랜드들은 법적 대응과 함께 공급망 다변화 및 가격 전략 조정을 통해 무역 불확실성에 대한 리스크 관리 체계를 구축해야 합니다.
so_what_en: In response to tariff policy changes, D2C brands must establish risk management systems through legal responses, supply chain diversification, and pricing strategy adjustments to address trade uncertainties.
key_points: Major retail brands filing tariff refund lawsuits
Policy changes related to IEEPA affecting trade
Industry becoming desensitized to trade volatility

title: Walmart app connects suppliers with store-level data
description: Walmart Data Ventures introduced Scintilla In-Store so field representatives can see real-time data — in part to reduce out-of-stocks.
summary_ko: 월마트 데이터 벤처스가 'Scintilla In-Store' 앱을 출시하여 공급업체를 매장 수준 데이터와 연결합니다. 현장 담당자들이 실시간 데이터를 확인할 수 있게 하여 품절 상황을 줄이는 것이 목적입니다. 공급업체와 소매업체 간 데이터 공유를 통한 운영 효율성 개선이 핵심입니다.
summary_en: Walmart Data Ventures launched the Scintilla In-Store app to connect suppliers with store-level data access. The platform enables field representatives to view real-time data, primarily aimed at reducing out-of-stock situations. The initiative focuses on improving operational efficiency through enhanced data sharing between suppliers and retailers.
so_what_ko: 실시간 매장 데이터 공유를 통한 재고 관리 최적화가 소매업계의 새로운 표준이 되고 있어, D2C 브랜드들도 파트너사와의 데이터 연동을 통해 운영 효율성을 높여야 합니다.
so_what_en: Real-time store data sharing for inventory optimization is becoming the new retail standard, requiring D2C brands to enhance operational efficiency through data integration with partners.
key_points: Real-time store-level data access for suppliers
Focus on reducing out-of-stock situations
Enhanced data sharing between retailers and suppliers

title: EBay cuts 6% of staff, axes 800 roles
description: The marketplace giant, which beat expectations in Q4, said it will continue to hire in certain priority areas.
summary_ko: eBay가 4분기 실적 예상치를 상회했음에도 불구하고 전체 직원의 6%인 800명을 해고한다고 발표했습니다. 마켓플레이스 거대 기업은 구조조정을 진행하면서도 우선순위 분야에서는 지속적으로 채용을 이어갈 계획이라고 밝혔습니다. 좋은 실적에도 불구한 대규모 인력 감축은 효율성 향상과 비용 최적화에 중점을 두고 있음을 시사합니다.
summary_en: eBay announced it will cut 6% of its workforce, eliminating 800 positions despite beating Q4 expectations. The marketplace giant stated it will continue hiring in certain priority areas while undergoing restructuring. The layoffs despite strong performance indicate a focus on operational efficiency and cost optimization.
so_what_ko: 실적이 좋음에도 불구한 대규모 인력 감축은 이커머스 플랫폼들이 AI 자동화와 운영 효율화를 통해 경쟁력을 확보하려는 움직임을 보여줍니다.
so_what_en: The layoffs despite strong performance suggest e-commerce platforms are prioritizing AI automation and operational efficiency to maintain competitiveness in the evolving digital marketplace.
key_points: eBay cuts 800 jobs (6% of workforce) despite beating Q4 expectations
Company will continue selective hiring in priority areas
Move suggests focus on operational efficiency and cost optimization

title: Premium toys drive US toy market rebound
description: Shoppers have turned away from more affordable options in favor of toys at higher price points, according to Circana.
summary_ko: 미국 장난감 시장이 프리미엄 제품 중심으로 회복세를 보이고 있다고 Circana가 발표했습니다. 소비자들이 저렴한 옵션에서 벗어나 더 높은 가격대의 장난감을 선호하는 경향으로 전환하고 있습니다. 이러한 프리미엄화 트렌드가 전체 장난감 시장의 반등을 이끌고 있는 것으로 나타났습니다.
summary_en: The US toy market is rebounding driven by premium products, according to Circana research. Shoppers are shifting away from more affordable options toward toys at higher price points. This premiumization trend is leading the overall toy market recovery.
so_what_ko: 프리미엄 제품으로의 소비자 선호 변화는 D2C 브랜드들이 고가치 제품 라인업과 프리미엄 브랜딩 전략에 집중해야 함을 시사합니다.
so_what_en: The shift toward premium products indicates D2C brands should focus on high-value product lines and premium branding strategies to capture evolving consumer preferences.
key_points: US toy market rebounds driven by premium products
Consumer shift from affordable to higher-priced toys
Premiumization trend leading market recovery

title: The Weekly Closeout: Walmart agrees to $100M FTC settlement and Puma posts double-digit declines
description: The government agency alleges that the big-box retailer deceived delivery drivers regarding their pay, while the athletic brand’s net sales fell 27% in Q4.
summary_ko: Walmart이 배송 기사들의 급여에 대해 기만했다는 혐의로 FTC와 1억 달러 합의에 동의했습니다. 스포츠 브랜드 Puma는 4분기 순매출이 27% 급락하며 두 자릿수 하락을 기록했습니다. 두 사건 모두 대형 리테일러들이 직면한 서로 다른 도전과제들을 보여주고 있습니다.
summary_en: Walmart agreed to a $100M FTC settlement over allegations of deceiving delivery drivers about their pay. Athletic brand Puma posted double-digit declines with net sales falling 27% in Q4. Both cases highlight different challenges facing major retailers.
so_what_ko: 대형 리테일러들의 법적 리스크와 실적 하락은 D2C 브랜드들이 투명한 운영과 차별화된 고객 가치 제안을 통해 시장 기회를 포착할 수 있음을 시사합니다.
so_what_en: Legal risks and performance declines among major retailers present opportunities for D2C brands to gain market share through transparent operations and differentiated customer value propositions.
key_points: Walmart settles $100M FTC case over delivery driver pay deception
Puma experiences 27% net sales decline in Q4
Major retailers facing regulatory and performance challenges

title: BlueLinx bets on AI as it navigates a soft housing market
description:
BlueLinx Holdings Inc. is retooling its digital strategy around artificial intelligence and expanding internal AI tools for employees, even as a soft housing market kept full-year sales flat in 2025. CEO Shyam Reddy said the company is cautious about pouring money into a traditional ecommerce platform as AI rapidly changes how customers may place orders. […]
The post BlueLinx bets on AI as it navigates a soft housing market appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
summary_ko: BlueLinx Holdings가 부진한 주택 시장 상황에서 인공지능 중심의 디지털 전략을 추진하고 있습니다. CEO Shyam Reddy는 AI가 고객 주문 방식을 빠르게 변화시키고 있어 전통적인 이커머스 플랫폼에 대한 투자를 신중하게 접근하고 있다고 밝혔습니다. 회사는 직원들을 위한 내부 AI 도구를 확장하며 AI 기반 영업 전략을 강화하고 있습니다.
summary_en: BlueLinx Holdings is retooling its digital strategy around artificial intelligence amid a soft housing market. CEO Shyam Reddy expressed caution about investing in traditional ecommerce platforms as AI rapidly changes customer ordering behaviors. The company is expanding internal AI tools for employees and strengthening AI-based sales strategies.
so_what_ko: 전통적인 B2B 기업도 AI 중심 디지털 전환을 통해 고객 경험을 혁신하고 있어, D2C 브랜드들도 AI 기술을 활용한 차별화된 고객 서비스 제공이 필수적입니다.
so_what_en: Traditional B2B companies embracing AI-driven digital transformation shows D2C brands must also leverage AI technology to deliver differentiated customer experiences and stay competitive.
key_points: BlueLinx focuses on AI-driven digital strategy amid soft housing market
CEO cautious about traditional ecommerce due to AI's rapid impact
Company expanding internal AI tools for employees

title: Resideo pushes connected products and digital buying tools
description:
Resideo Technologies is focusing further on connected devices and ecommerce sales as it reshapes how contractors and integrators buy and manage building technology after its fiscal Q4 — even as the company swings to a full-year 2025 loss tied to a one-time charge. Scottsdale, Arizona-based Resideo reported Q4 sales of $1.895 billion. That’s up from […]
The post Resideo pushes connected products and digital buying tools appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
summary_ko: Resideo Technologies가 연결형 기기와 디지털 구매 도구에 집중하며 건축 기술 관련 계약업체와 통합업체들의 구매 및 관리 방식을 혁신하고 있습니다. 회사는 4분기 매출 18억 9500만 달러를 기록했으나 일회성 비용으로 인해 2025년 전체적으로는 손실을 기록했습니다. 이커머스 판매와 연결형 제품에 대한 지속적인 투자를 통해 사업 구조를 재편하고 있습니다.
summary_en: Resideo Technologies is focusing on connected devices and ecommerce sales, reshaping how contractors and integrators buy and manage building technology.
